DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Stress Urinary Incontinence Study
DOC.criteria: Are great 20 year age . Are female outpatient . Present SUI base disease diagnostic criterion , average least one incontinent episode per day screen diary , symptom SUI minimum 3 month prior study entry . Are woman nonchildbearing potential reason hysterectomy , surgery , natural menopause , woman childbearing potential test negative pregnancy time enrollment base urine pregnancy test agree use medically accept mean contraception ( example , intrauterine device [ IUD ] , oral injectable contraceptive , implant , barrier device , sterilization , abstinence , sex vasectomize male partner ) duration study . Women use oral contraceptive hormone replacement therapy must stable dose regimen great equal 3 month prior entry study . Have language barrier , agree comply requirement protocol , sign write informed consent document prior entry study . Suffer severe constipation ( example , impact rectum time physical examination despite recent evacuation ) . Has physical examination , neurological and/or vaginal examination result , opinion investigator , exclude subject . Are medication regimen ( include diuretic ) dose and/or frequency stable least 12 week prior randomization , anticipated change course study . Have major inpatient surgery within 3 month prior study entry . Have current diagnosis follow condition , disorder , disease genitourinary tract : Ureteric , bladder , urethral , rectal fistula Uncorrected congenital abnormality lead urinary incontinence Detrusor instability noncompliant bladder Adult enuresis Voiding difficulty ( i.e. , subject complains difficulty empty bladder ) .
